question: The ‘Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors of G20 nations’ Meeting was recently organised in which city?
explanation:
The Meeting of Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors from G20 nations was recently organised in Riyadh from February 22-23, 2020.
The delegates from across the world attended the meeting, which focussed on maintaining the growth of global economy amid the negative effect of Corona virus in China and some countries.
